page.title: 20TOURISM
page.content: Although the area is largely rural the presence of the I.C.I. complex and the resultant pollution means that tourism is on a small scale and limited to the village of Kirkleatham. In Kirkleatham tourism is in its infancy although there are plans just begun for major development.They plan to build a park,an aviary and a large greenhouse.The people have different opinions to the local council.The council wish to develop Kirkleatham into a tourist attraction but the people who live nearby think its too much of an industrial area and the moors and sea-side aren't very far away.{LOCAL HISTORY:}Kirkleatham museum concentrates on the rural and social developments of the past 400 years.The Almshouses opened in 1676 bear the name of Sir William Turner the Benefactor.
